name: Button
description: 按钮组件，用于触发操作或事件
props: {"type": "ButtonType (Normal, Capsule, Circle)", "stateEffect": "boolean - 是否开启按压态效果", "buttonStyle": "ButtonStyleMode - 按钮样式模式"}

name: Text
description: 文本组件，用于显示文字内容
props: {"content": "string | Resource - 文本内容", "fontSize": "number | string - 字体大小", "fontColor": "ResourceColor - 字体颜色", "fontWeight": "FontWeight - 字体粗细", "textAlign": "TextAlign - 文本对齐方式"}

name: Image
description: 图片组件，用于显示图片资源
props: {"src": "PixelMap | ResourceStr | DrawableDescriptor", "objectFit": "ImageFit - 图片填充模式", "interpolation": "ImageInterpolation - 图片插值"}

name: TextInput
props: {"placeholder": "ResourceStr - 占位符文本", "type": "InputType - 输入类型", "maxLength": "number - 最大输入长度", "enterKeyType": "EnterKeyType - 回车键类型"}

name: Toggle
description: 开关组件，用于切换状态
props: {"type": "ToggleType (Checkbox, Switch, Button)", "isOn": "boolean - 是否开启", "selectedColor": "ResourceColor - 选中颜色"}

name: Slider
description: 滑动条组件，用于数值选择
props: {"value": "number - 当前值", "min": "number - 最小值", "max": "number - 最大值", "step": "number - 步长", "style": "SliderStyle - 滑块样式"}

name: Progress
description: 进度条组件，用于显示任务进度
props: {"value": "number - 当前进度值", "total": "number - 总进度值", "type": "ProgressType - 进度条类型"}

name: LoadingProgress
description: 加载中组件，用于显示加载状态

name: Badge
description: 徽标组件，用于显示消息数量或状态
props: {"count": "number - 徽标数字", "maxCount": "number - 最大显示数字", "position": "BadgePosition - 徽标位置"}

name: Tabs
description: 页签组件，用于页面切换导航
props: {"barPosition": "BarPosition - 页签位置", "index": "number - 当前页签索引", "controller": "TabsController - 控制器"}

name: Navigation
description: 导航组件，用于页面路由导航
props: {"title": "string | CustomBuilder - 标题", "mode": "NavigationMode - 导航模式", "navBarWidth": "Length - 导航栏宽度"}

name: List
description: 列表组件，用于展示列表数据
props: {"space": "number - 列表项间距", "initialIndex": "number - 初始索引", "scroller": "Scroller - 滚动控制器"}

name: Grid
description: 网格组件，用于网格布局展示
props: {"columnsTemplate": "string - 列模板", "rowsTemplate": "string - 行模板", "columnsGap": "Length - 列间距", "rowsGap": "Length - 行间距"}

name: Swiper
description: 轮播组件，用于轮播展示内容
props: {"index": "number - 当前索引", "autoPlay": "boolean - 自动播放", "interval": "number - 播放间隔(ms)", "indicator": "boolean | DotIndicator - 指示器"}

name: Dialog
description: 对话框组件，用于重要信息提示或操作确认
props: {"title": "ResourceStr - 标题", "message": "ResourceStr - 消息内容", "autoCancel": "boolean - 点击遮罩是否关闭", "alignment": "DialogAlignment - 对齐方式"}
